metadata.name: Crimson King
metadata.description:
The time before the Great Calamity was a time of peace and prosperity on the continent of Artania. The four kingdoms were ruled by four mighty kings who possessed the magic of the old gods. 

King Virgary, the lord of the eastern lands where lavish evergreen forests sat on the banks of the deep lake Ayla, was a master of miraculous healing.

The colors of his house were green and crimson red.
